CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 31, 1969, pg. 15 reads: "Irvis At Mt. Ararat - Fred Gladney, standing left, is president of the Mt. Ararat Baptist Men's League, which sponsored A Scholarship Banquet recently, featuring an address by Representative K. Leroy Irvis, standing second from right. Others in photo, standing left to right are, M. Evans, Rev. H. Beecher Hicks, pastor, and Robert Russell.  Seated, clockwise are, Mrs. H.B. Hicks, wife of the pastor; Mrs. C.A. Burrell and Dr. C.A. Burrell, pastor emeritus of this congregation. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait seated from left: Mrs. H. B. Hicks, Mrs. Burrell, Dr. C. A. Burrell; standing: Fred Gladney, M. Evans, Rev. H. Beecher Hicks, K. Leroy Irvis, and Robert Russell, gathered for Mt. Ararat Baptist Church Men's League scholarship banquet
CatSubject_tab: Irvis, K. Leroy, 1919-Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Clergy--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Banquets--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Mt. Ararat Baptist Church (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
